letters.description: Charting the client's autonomic hierarchy to identify personal markers of safety, mobilization, and collapse.
Cultivating neuroceptive skills to detect internal physiological shifts and external triggers in real-time.
Implementing somatic tools and vagal toning exercises to interrupt dysregulation and anchor the system.
Leveraging the Social Engagement System to foster safety through relational cues and environmental adjustments.
Strengthening neural pathways to improve autonomic flexibility and maintain a wider window of tolerance.
